revised_title: General Bi-Harmonic Analysis for Plates with Circular Holes
tldr: The authors present a general solution for stress distribution in infinite plates containing circular holes of varying sizes. The method can be extended to plates with straight boundaries, allowing for a more comprehensive understanding of stress distribution in various plate configurations. The solution is demonstrated through a specific case of an infinite plate under tension with three circular holes in a row, and the results are compared with experimental data.
